column1: Table 11.2  CHILD CARE USE, Household characteristics, Households with children aged 0–13 years
Contribution of government pensions and allowances to gross household income
# Proportion has a high margin of error and should be used with caution.

Cells in this table containing 2019–20 data have been randomly adjusted (by perturbation) to avoid the release of confidential data. Discrepancies may occur between sums of the component items and totals. Differences may occur between tables only where estimates are produced for different units (e.g. person, household or expenditure units). See Methodology for more information
(a) Regulated child care away from the child's home
(b) Non-regulated child care either in the child's home or elsewhere
(c) Includes households with nil or negative total income
